N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 405.4 - Procedures for implementation

State Regulations
(a) The social services district shall
establish a procedure for the administration of purchase of services contracts. As part of such procedure, the social services district shall assign
responsibility to one or more staff members for maintenance and monitoring of
purchase of services contracts. (b) Maintenance and monitoring of contracts includes the following as a minimum: (1)
maintaining contract files and
implementing a system for orderly renewal of lapsing contracts or termination
of contracts no longer required; and
(2)
developing an effective system for
evaluation and review of contracts on at least an annual basis and the quality
of services being provided under contracts in force. (c) The social services district shall
compile and maintain a master index of all existing or newly executed
contracts. Notes
